snippet: The Justice Ministry has filed a suit in Russia’s Supreme Court to disband the Memorial Society, an organization created in the late 1980s to preserve the legacy of victims of Stalinism.
abstract: Russia's Justice Ministry files suit in country's Supreme Court to disband Memorial Society, organization created in 1980s to preserve legacy of victims of Stalinism.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Ministry has filed a suit in Russia’s Supreme Court to disband the Memorial Society, an organization created in the late 1980s to preserve the legacy of victims of Stalinism.

headline.main: Russia: Ministry Takes Aim at a Human Rights Group
headline.print_headline: Russia: Ministry Takes Aim at a Human Rights Group
